plot: What would life be like without water? We use water everyday to cook, clean, bathe and drink. Oviedo is a small town in the Dominican Republic where people struggle to find water to meet ...
title: Where There Is No Water
plot_es: What would life be like without water? We use water everyday to cook, clean, bathe and drink. Oviedo is a small town in the Dominican Republic where people struggle to find water to meet ...
